channel.title: bbcnews TikTok
channel.description: OK Boomer, all the latest TikToks from bbcnews

item.title: The US president is travelling to Israel for the release of hostages from Gaza under the ceasefire deal agreed between Israel and Hamas. #Israel #DonaldTrump #MiddleEast #BreakingNews #BBCNews
item.description: The US president is travelling to Israel for the release of hostages from Gaza under the ceasefire deal agreed between Israel and Hamas. #Israel #DonaldTrump #MiddleEast #BreakingNews #BBCNews

item.title: The first seven Israeli hostages being freed in Gaza today are now with the Israeli military, the IDF has confirmed. #Israel #MiddleEast #BreakingNews #BBCNews
item.description: The first seven Israeli hostages being freed in Gaza today are now with the Israeli military, the IDF has confirmed. #Israel #MiddleEast #BreakingNews #BBCNews

item.title: There were loud cheers in Hostages Square in Tel Aviv as news of the release of the first hostages emerged. #Israel #TelAviv #MiddleEast #BreakingNews #BBCNews
item.description: There were loud cheers in Hostages Square in Tel Aviv as news of the release of the first hostages emerged. #Israel #TelAviv #MiddleEast #BreakingNews #BBCNews

item.title: Nimrod Cohen is among the 20 Israeli hostages who are set for release on Monday. They have been held in Gaza since the 7 October attacks in 2023. In exchange for the hostages, Israel will release 250 Palestinian prisoners and more than 1,700 detainees. #T
item.description: Nimrod Cohen is among the 20 Israeli hostages who are set for release on Monday. They have been held in Gaza since the 7 October attacks in 2023. In exchange for the hostages, Israel will release 250 Palestinian prisoners and more than 1,700 detainees. #T

item.title: Donald Trump will soon speak to the Israeli parliament - he will then head to Egypt for a summit attended by around 20 world leaders. #DonaldTrump #MiddleEast #Israel #TelAviv #BBCNews
item.description: Donald Trump will soon speak to the Israeli parliament - he will then head to Egypt for a summit attended by around 20 world leaders. #DonaldTrump #MiddleEast #Israel #TelAviv #BBCNews

item.title: Seven Israeli hostages have been freed in Gaza and are now back in Israel, the Israel Defense Forces have confirmed. #Israel #Ceasefire #RedCross #DonaldTrump #BBCNews

item.title: Matan Angres, a 22-year-old IDF soldier, is one of 20 living hostages released on Monday. Israel will release 250 Palestinian prisoners and more than 1,700 detainees in exchange. #Israel #MiddleEast #BreakingNews #BBCNews
item.description: Matan Angres, a 22-year-old IDF soldier, is one of 20 living hostages released on Monday. Israel will release 250 Palestinian prisoners and more than 1,700 detainees in exchange. #Israel #MiddleEast #BreakingNews #BBCNews

item.title: The Israeli military says all 20 hostages in Gaza have now been handed over. Israel will release 250 Palestinian prisoners and more than 1,700 detainees.#MiddleEast #BreakingNews #BBCNews
